changeSet.createView: SELECT t.id, t.tranship_code, t.project_code, t.project_site_code, TO_CHAR(t.tranship_date,'yyyy-MM-dd') as tranship_date, TO_CHAR(t.receive_date,'yyyy-MM-dd') as receive_date, t.tranship_state, t.sample_satisfaction,t.track_number, (select u.last_name||u.first_name from jhi_user u where u.id=t.receiver_id) as receiver, receive_type FROM tranship t
